original_title: LOLC Divi Saviya’s continuous commitment towards nurturing futures
original_body_lines: LOLC Divi Saviya recently launched the third phase of its educational initiative in sync with the Christmas spirit. This phase aims to expand its reach to 100-150 student-populated schools nationwide, marking a significant milestone of having reached 3000 schools by the completion of the previous phase in November.

Dubbed “Gifting the Future,” LOLC Divi Saviya’s unique Christmas edition for December signifies the organization’s commitment to making a positive impact on young minds, ensuring a brighter future for the country. The initiative is themed around the act of giving and has orchestrated special activities across 24 LOLC branches, involving regional schoolchildren to emphasize the importance of nurturing dreams.

Kapila Jayawardena, LOLC Group’s Group Managing Director/CEO, expressed pride in the initiative, highlighting its contribution to the education of a significant portion of the country’s schools. The launch event for Phase 03, themed “Gifting the Future,” took place at Excel World, Park Premier, witnessing the participation of over 350 students from selected schools in Colombo and its suburbs.
